## atLeastOne() function

Checks for at least one of the given elements being defined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function atLeastOne(...args: any): boolean;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if one or more are defined; false if all are undefined
